summary: Inside the X-Files for a behind-the-scenes look at the show. Also included are interviews with the cast and creator Chris Carter, never before seen segments from the show, outtakes and a sneak preview of the upcoming feature film.
cast: Chris Carter|David Duchovny|Gillian Anderson|William B. Davis|Sheila Larken|Mitch Pileggi|Bruce Harwood|Dean Haglund|Tom Braidwood|Nicholas Lea|Jerry Hardin|Steven Williams|Laurie Holden|Brian Thompson
keywords: x files|cast|behind the scenes|tv show|making of
title: Dentro de Expediente X
